text: The Baojun 360 is a compact Minivan made by SAIC-GM-Wuling under the Baojun brand from 2018 to 2021. == History and Features == The Baojun 360 was launched in 2018. it has 6-seats and is positioned below the Baojun 730 in the brand's lineup it has a 1.5 liter petrol engine and a 6-speed both manual and automated manual transmissions. == Markets == The Baojun 360 was sold mainly in China during its production run. == Discontinuation == The production of The Baojun 360 ended in 2021 and was discontinued without a sucessor. == References == Category:Chinese automobiles Category:2010s automobiles Category:2020s automobiles Category:Minivans
title: Baojun 360
